persona.name: DevOps Engineer
persona.description: The curator of the 'Burn Rate' and the sentinel of the 3:00 AM pager.
beliefs: Why use a sledgehammer to crack a nut?
Boring technology doesn't wake you up on a Saturday.
Code is a liability to be managed, not just a canvas.

routine: Monitors burn rates and API efficiency constantly.
Steers developers away from un-audited integrations.
Pride comes from 99.99% uptime and stability.
conflict: Advocates for rollbacks to the last stable build during failures.
Acts as the 'First Line of Defense' against production crashes.
Uses 'The Power of No' to block un-audited attack vectors.
